com.naef.jnlua
Class LuaException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              com.naef.jnlua.LuaException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LuaMemoryAllocationException, LuaRuntimeException, LuaSyntaxException
public abstract class LuaException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException

Abstract base class for Lua error conditions. Lua exceptions are unchecked runtime exceptions.

See Also:
